m:agent.m:name: dk.kb.dup.metsApi software agent using data from Manuscript department at Royal Library, Copenhagen, DK.

md:note.div:
[olim kps. 19/X]
Pergament, 1 blad, ca. 24 × 11 cm; Italien, ca. 900
Bladets indre kant er beskadiget, med teksttab til følge. Med lakuner indeholder det følgende tekststykke af Festus, Breviarium historiae populi Romani:
recto: "///am in exitium persice gentis ...diocletiano indignatione" (= Brev. XXII–XXV, ed. Eadie (1967) p. 63,17-65,15)
verso: "passuum cucurrerit purpurat/// ... milites ab in///" (= Brev. XXV–XXVII, ed. Eadie (1967) p. 65,16-67,6)
Fragmentet er ikke anført i oversigten over håndskrifter i J. W. Eadie’s kritiske udgave af Festus’ Breviarium (London 1967), men diskuteres indgående i hans afhandling fra samme år (jf. nedenfor)
Bibl.: Paul Lehmann, Skandinavische Reisefrüchte, NF, 2. Nachlese 3, in: Nordisk Tidskrift för Bok- och Biblioteksväsen, 25, 1938, p. 252f. - J. W. Eadie in: University of London, Institute of Classical Studies: Bulletin, 14, 1967, p. 93-96 (+ plates VII & VIII). - E. A. Lowe, The Beneventan Script. A History of the South Italian Minuscule. Second Edition prepared and enlarged by Virginia Brown, vol. II, Hand List of Beneventan Mss., Roma 1980, p. 35. - Bernhard Bischoff, Katalog der festländischen Handschriften des neunten Jahrhunderts (mit Ausnahme der wisigotischen). Teil I: Aachen - Lambach, ed. Birgit Ebersperger, Wiesbaden 1998, p. 413 no. 1993
Erik Petersen

[olim kps. 19/X]
Parchment, 1 f., c. 24 × 11 cm; Italy, c. 900
The inner part of the leaf has been damaged, and text lost. Including lacunae it contains the following text of Festus, Breviarium historiae populi Romani:
recto: "///am in exitium persice gentis ... diocletiano indignatione" (= Brev. XXII–XXV, ed. Eadie (1967) p. 63,17-65,15)
verso: "passuum cucurrerit purpurat/// ... milites ab in///" (= Brev. XXV–XXVII, ed. Eadie (1967) p. 65,16-67,6)
The fragment is not mentioned in the survey of manuscripts in J. W. Eadie’s critical edition of Festus’ Breviarium (London 1967), but is discussed in detail in his article published the same year (cf. below)
Bibl.: Paul Lehmann, Skandinavische Reisefrüchte, NF, 2. Nachlese 3, in: Nordisk Tidskrift för Bok- och Biblioteksväsen, 25, 1938, p. 252f. - J. W. Eadie in: University of London, Institute of Classical Studies: Bulletin, 14, 1967, p. 93-96 (+ plates VII & VIII). - E. A. Lowe, The Beneventan Script. A History of the South Italian Minuscule. Second Edition prepared and enlarged by Virginia Brown, vol. II, Hand List of Beneventan Mss., Roma 1980, p. 35. - Bernhard Bischoff, Katalog der festländischen Handschriften des neunten Jahrhunderts (mit Ausnahme der wisigotischen). Teil I: Aachen - Lambach, ed. Birgit Ebersperger, Wiesbaden 1998, p. 413 no. 1993
Erik Petersen
